author: Freya Noble For Daily Mail Australia
title: Sydney battered by nightmare storms again this weekend | Daily Mail Online
text: Monday: Max 20, possible shower Tuesday: Max 23, mostly sunny Wednesday: Max 32, sunny Thursday: Max 25, mostly sunny Friday: Max 22, mostly cloudy Saturday : Max 26, possible shower Sunday : Max 23, mostly sunny HOBART Tuesday: Max 21, mostly sunny Wednesday: Max 29,sunny Thursday: Max 24, mostly sunny Friday: Max 22, possible shower Saturday : Max 21, mostly sunny Sunday : Max 24, mostly sunny BRISBANE Monday: Max 32, mostly sunny Tuesday: Max 31, mostly sunny Wednesday: Max 30, showers Thursday: Max 31, possible shower Friday: Max 31, mostly sunny Saturday : Max 32, mostly sunny Sunday : Max 30, possible shower CANBERRA Monday: Max 23, mostly sunny Tuesday: Max 28, sunny Wednesday: Max 32, mostly sunny Thursday: Max 36, mostly sunny Friday: Max 32, possible shower Saturday : Max 27, possible shower Sunday : Max 28, possible shower ADELAIDE Monday: Max 23, mostly sunny Tuesday: Max 31, sunny Wednesday: Max 33, mostly sunny Thursday: Max 27, increasing sun Friday: Max 27, mostly sunny Saturday : Max 27, mostly sunny Sunday : Max 29, sunny Monday: Max 34, mostly sunny Tuesday: Max 34, mostly sunny Wednesday: Max 33, mostly sunny Thursday: Max 33, possible storm Friday: Max 32, possible storm Saturday : Max 32, possible storm Sunday : Max 33, possible storm In Victoria, some of the alpine region including Mount Hotham, Mount Buller, and Falls Creek were covered in snow at the weekend. Meteorologists said it's not uncommon to see snow in the summer - but the fact that it happens in February is 'a bit rare.' The snow is likely to melt away before Monday ends, according to forecasts.
